203 TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetNormalized(const WeightType& weight) const
204 {
205  TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> result;
206 
207  GetNormalized(weight, result);
208 
209  return result;

239 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
240 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::TWeightedNumber(const ValueType& sum, const WeightT& weight)
241 {

243  m_weight = weight;

247 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
248 void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::Reset()
249 {
250  m_sum = 0;
251  m_weight = 0;
252 }

255 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
256 inline bool TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::IsImportant() const
257 {
258  return m_weight > I_EPSILON;
259 }

264 {
265  return m_sum;
266 }

290 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
291 typename TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::ValueType TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetValue() const
292 {
293  Q_ASSERT(IsImportant());
294 
295  return (m_sum / m_weight);
296 }

298 
299 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
300 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::Normalize(const WeightType& weight)
301 {
302  TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum * weight / m_weight, weight);
303 }
304 
305 
306 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
307 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetNormalized(const WeightType& weight, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
308 {
309  result.m_sum = m_sum * weight / m_weight;
310  result.m_weight = weight;
311 }

314 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
315 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::Scale(double scale)
316 {
317  m_sum *= scale;
318  m_weight *= scale;
319 }

322 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
323 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetScaled(double scale, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
324 {
325  result.m_sum = m_sum * scale;
326  result.m_weight = m_weight * scale;
327 }

333  m_sum += value;

344 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>

346 {
347  m_sum -= value;
348 }

350 
351 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
352 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::SubWeight(WeightType weight)
353 {
354  m_weight -= weight;
355 }

357 
358 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
359 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::SimpleAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value)
360 {
361  m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight + value.m_sum * m_weight);
362  m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
363 }
364 
365 
366 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
367 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
368 {
369  TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> result;
370 
371  GetSimpleAdd(value, result);
372 
373  return result;
374 }
375 
376 
377 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
378 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
379 {
380  result.m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight + value.m_sum * m_weight);
381  result.m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
382 }
383 
384 
385 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
386 void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::SimpleSub(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value)
387 {
388  m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight - value.m_sum * m_weight);
389  m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
390 }
391 
392 
393 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
394 TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleSub(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
395 {
396  TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> result;
397 
398  GetSimpleSub(value, result);
399 
400  return result;
401 }
402 
403 
404 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
405 void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleSub(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
406 {
407  result.m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight - value.m_sum * m_weight);
408  result.m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
409 }

411 
412 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
413 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::Add(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value)
414 {
415  SimpleAdd(value);
416  Normalize(::sqrt(m_weight));
417 }
418 
419 
420 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
421 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
422 {
423  TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> result;
424 
425  GetSimpleAdd(value, result);
426  result.Normalize(::sqrt(result.m_weight));
427 
428  return result;
429 }

434 {

460 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>

462 {

464  result.Normalize(::sqrt(result.m_weight));

468 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
469 inline bool TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator==(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& number) const
470 {
471  return (m_sum == number.m_sum) &&
472  (m_weight == number.m_weight);
473 }
474 
475 
476 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
477 inline bool TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator!=(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& number) const
478 {
479  return (m_sum != number.m_sum) ||
480  (m_weight != number.m_weight);
481 }

484 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
485 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator+(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
486 {
487  return TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum + value.m_sum, m_weight + value.m_weight);
488 }

491 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>

493 {
494  return TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum - value.m_sum, m_weight - value.m_weight);
495 }

562 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
563 inline imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator+(ValueType scalar) const
564 {
565  return imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum + m_weight * scalar, m_weight);
566 }
567 
568 
569 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
570 inline imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator-(ValueType scalar) const
571 {
572  return imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum - m_weight * scalar, m_weight);
573 }

585 {
